Name: Universe For Sale - Prologue
About the game: The Prologue of Universe for Sale , in this demo you will get a taste of what will be in the final game, which is currently in development. Live a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance, follow the stories of the nameless Master , a mysterious cultist and Lila the universes vendor. Walk through Jupiter's roads, meet absurd characters with incredible stories to tell, and craft your own stories with Lila's power to create custom universes. Features: • Immerse yourself through a picturesque, full hand-drawn world, highly inspired by the European's sci-fi comics. • Discover the past of mysterious characters and religions to achieve enlightenment. • Relax with an original soundtrack. • Create personalized universes in a chill-out atmosphere.
